xwikidoc.name: Translations

xwikidoc.content:
## Feedback form feedbackform.buttonLabel=Feedback feedbackform.title=Feedback feedbackform.introText=Thank you for your feedback!
We will review your message as soon as possible. Normally we do not contact you back on this subject. However, we will take the liberty of reaching out to you if we have any questions. feedbackform.type=Feedback Type feedbackform.type.currentPage=Current page feedbackform.type.other=Other feedbackform.types.website=Website feedbackform.types.website.field.title=Title feedbackform.types.website.field.title.ms=Ms. feedbackform.types.website.field.title.mr=Mr. feedbackform.types.website.field.firstName=First name feedbackform.types.website.field.lastName=Last name feedbackform.user.reporter=Reporter feedbackform.types.website.field.email=E-mail feedbackform.types.website.field.subject=Subject feedbackform.types.website.field.message=Message feedbackform.types.website.confirmationMessage=Thank you for your feedback! It is highly appreciated and it helps us improve our website! feedbackform.types.website.email.page=Page: feedbackform.types.website.email.user=Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback on our website!
We will review it as soon as possible.
See the details of your feedback below:

feedbackform.types.website.email.subject.user=Your feedback feedbackform.types.website.email.wiki=A new feedback has been sent !
See the details of the feedback below:

feedbackform.types.website.email.subject.wiki=New user feedback feedbackform.confirmationMessage=Thank you for your feedback! feedbackform.attachment=Image or File (max. 5MB,JPG, PNG, PDF) feedbackform.consentMessage=Provide data from your environment, eg. browser and page URL. This helps us understand your feedback. feedbackform.sendFeedback=Send feedback feedbackform.invalidFile=Only jpeg, png, and pdf formats are allowed and file size must not exceed 5 MB! feedbackform.invalidFormData=An error occurred while sending the feedback. The following fields are required: Feedback type, Title, First name, Last name, E-mail, Subject, Message. Note that, when a file is attached, it must be in one of these formats: 'JPG, PNG, PDF' and not exceed a size of 5MB. feedbackform.sendingFeedbackError=An error occurred while sending the feedback. feedbackform.sendingEmailFeedbackError=An error occurred while sending feedback form email, Error: {} feedbackform.submitError=An error occurred while sending the feedback: feedbackform.types.website.environment=Environment feedbackform.types.website.environment.pageURL=Location feedbackform.types.website.environment.referrer=Referrer feedbackform.types.website.environment.userAgent=User Agent feedbackform.types.website.environment.screenResolution=Screen Resolution feedbackform.labelAttachFilesOrImages=Attach files or images feedbackform.labelAttachFileOrImage=Attach a file or an image feedbackform.labelAttachFile=Attach files feedbackform.labelAttachFiles=Attach a file feedbackform.tooManyFiles=You are trying to send {0} files. The maximum is {1}. Please remove some. feedbackform.maxFileSizeExceededSeveral=You are trying to send {0}, which is higher than the allowed maximum of {1}. Please send fewer or smaller files. feedbackform.maxFileSizeExceededOne=You are trying to send {0}, which is higher than the allowed maximum of {1}. Please send a smaller file. feedbackform.fileSizeUnit.B=B feedbackform.fileSizeUnit.KB=KB feedbackform.fileSizeUnit.MB=MB feedbackform.fileSizeUnit.GB=GB feedbackform.labelMax=max. feedbackform.labelFiles={0} files feedbackform.wysiwygFieldRequired=Please fill in all the required fields feedbackform.incorrectFileType=Incorrect file type. Accepted types or extensions: {0}
